block.comment:
Pin X and Pin Y are used to sense the where the joy stick is position. Button pin is used sense whether joystick is being pressed.
A pin is a piece of metal connected to the Arduino used to control or sense electricity.
Below ---- is where you can set values that the virtual circuit will take in.
The void loop function runs over and over again forever
It checks a condition using the if statement, executes a block of code if the condition is true, and otherwise executes the code inside the block when the condition is false.
Returns whether true if someone is pressing down on the joystick.
Set defined pin to HIGH or LOW to turn on or off the LED light.
Set defined pin to HIGH or LOW to turn on or off the LED light.
The if statement checks a condition and executes the following block of code if the condition is true.
Compares what is in the left and right and returns true or false.
Return the angle the joystick is positioned in.

Returns whether true if someone is moving the joystick to a position.
